alert.note: Alert for Big Stone (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 21 at 2:30AM CDT until April 22 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM CDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. Locally higher gusts possible. * WHERE...Portions of west central Minnesota and north central and northeast South Dakota. * WHEN...Until 1 AM CDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slick spots on roads. The combination of snow and gusty winds will create blowing snow, reducing visibilities at times. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. In Minnesota, the latest road conditions can be obtained at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1. In South Dakota, the latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
